references.paper_title: Amortized implicit differentiation for stochastic bilevel optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach to stochastic bilevel optimization that is both efficient and effective, which is highly relevant to the current work.

references.paper_title: Mathematical programs with optimization problems in the constraints
references.reason: This is a foundational paper in bilevel optimization, providing the initial formulation and analysis of the problem.

references.paper_title: Model-agnostic meta-learning for fast adaptation of deep networks
references.reason: Model-agnostic meta-learning (MAML) is a highly influential method in meta-learning, and this paper introduces the MAML algorithm, which is directly related to the application of the current work.

references.paper_title: Forward and reverse gradient-based hyperparameter optimization
references.reason: This paper presents a method for hyperparameter optimization using gradient-based techniques, which is closely related to the approach used in the current work.

references.paper_title: On the iteration complexity of hypergradient computation
references.reason: This paper provides a detailed analysis of the computational complexity of hypergradient computation, which is a key aspect of bilevel optimization algorithms.
